channel.title: Pop3 on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Pop3 on TLDRBins

item.title: POP3
item.description: POP3 # Connect to POP3 mail server telnet 10.10.11.10 110 # Send cmd after +OK USER <USER> PASS <PASSWORD> # List all mails LIST # Retrieve mail #1 RETR 1 # Exit Ctrl + ], then quit
